data.text: Module 4, that's kind of one of the cool ones. That's Potent Printables. So we show you how to make paper products and make a paper product interactive, digital, so basically using QR codes and how you can create really cool worksheets or lesson plans - materials - and then all the kids these days have smartphones. How they can access audio, or quizzes or video and have it sync with the paper copy. So first, we're going to use OpenOffice Draw to make some really cool worksheets really quickly that's really fun, and then we're going to show you how to share your work with other teachers online using Pintrest and how to find cool lesson online, and then the most important things is we show how to use QR Stuff and that is how to put a QR Code on a piece of papers, so people can access it on their phone.
